// Firebase Configuration for Village Auto Connect
import{initializeApp}from'firebase/app';import{getAuth,GoogleAuthProvider}from'firebase/auth';import{getFirestore}from'firebase/firestore';// Firebase config - Sullia Auto Connect Project
const firebaseConfig={apiKey:"AIzaSyC_CsK5PAJcP9VclF7u42IQc0ClI6fOZdw",authDomain:"sullia-auto-connect.firebaseapp.com",projectId:"sullia-auto-connect",storageBucket:"sullia-auto-connect.firebasestorage.app",messagingSenderId:"648404312897",appId:"1:648404312897:web:22218d3a3a4109b587f7c0"};// Initialize Firebase
const app=initializeApp(firebaseConfig);// Initialize Firebase Authentication and get a reference to the service

export const googleProvider=new GoogleAuthProvider();// Configure Google Provider
googleProvider.setCustomParameters({prompt:'select_account'});export default app;
